Row.Text: Zombies can turn any units they kill into other zombies
Zombies can turn any units they kill into other zombies
There was an explosion during the production[NEWLINE]of your new bio-weapon and it could[NEWLINE]not be contained.
Impaitent with the length of time testing takes[NEWLINE]a scientist attempted to speed the process[NEWLINE]resulting in a terrible accident.
A group of scientists have disobeyed your directive[NEWLINE]and attempted to produce the bio weapon anyway,[NEWLINE]leading to accidental exposure.
